Warrington Wolves and England full-back Stefan Ratchford has signed a contract extension with the Super League side.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The 28-year-old was contracted to Wire until 2018 but this new deal will run until 2020.
He moved to the club in 2012 after beginning his career at Salford.
"I'm delighted to get this over the line. The next few years are exciting with the young lads coming through and the current squad we have," he told the club website.
